column7: Study of special themes, selected topics or current issues in museum studies for undergraduate students with backgrounds in museology. Course may be in seminar or lecture format. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 6 hours. Prerequisite: MUSE 200 and ANTH 462.
column9: May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 6 hours. Prerequisite: MUSE 200 and ANTH 462.
